content:
structure Time where
  hour : Nat
  minute : Nat
  second : Nat
  fracExponent : Nat := 0
  fracMantissa : Nat := 0
  deriving Inhabited, DecidableEq
namespace Time
abbrev IsValidHour (h : Nat) : Prop :=
  h ≤ 23
abbrev IsValidMinute (m : Nat) : Prop :=
  m ≤ 59
abbrev IsValidSecond (s : Nat) : Prop :=
  s ≤ 60
def zero : Time :=
  {hour := 0, minute := 0, second := 0}
